snippet.title: PAYDAY 2: Mountain Master Heist Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
The Mountain Master heist and the Golden Dagger tailor pack is available now! Join the Payday Gang in putting a stop to Yufu Wang and his triad before they have a chance to regroup. Joined by new allies and donned in new gear, the Payday Gang stands ready.

Mountain Master Heist: https://pd2.link/MountainMasterYS
Golden Dagger Tailor Pack: https://pd2.link/MountainMasterYS2
